text: American country music duo Dan + Shay have released three studio albums and eleven singles. Their first two albums — Where It All Began (2014) and Obsessed — generated a collective four number top ten hits on the Billboard Country Airplay chart, including three consecutive number ones. Since the release of "Tequila" in 2018, the duo has experienced crossover success with their music, placing three singles including "Tequila" in the top ten of the Adult Pop Songs chart in addition to their success in the country genre. ==Albums== ===Studio albums=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" style="text-align:center;" |- ! rowspan="2" style="width:13em;"| Title ! rowspan="2" style="width:20em;"| Album details ! colspan="5"| Peak chart positions ! rowspan="2" style="width:10em;"| Sales ! rowspan="2" style="width:10em;"| Certifications |- style="font-size:smaller;" ! style="width:4em;"| US ! style="width:4em;"| US Country ! style="width:4em;"| AUS Peak positions on Australian Singles Chart and Albums Chart: * * Obsessed: * "Tequila": ! style="width:4em;"| CAN ! style="width:4em;"| UK Country Peak positions on UK Country Artists Albums Chart: * Where It All Began: * Obsessed: * Dan + Shay: |- ! scope="row"| Where It All Began | * Release date: April 1, 2014 * Label: Warner Bros.
